channel.title: A Problem with my Voule (AutoRestarter)
channel.description:
Well, i finally was convinced to download an auto restarter, and the Voule is the only one that has worked for me. which is sad, because it doesnt work.
My Problem: The Voule starts my server, and its simple to set to reboot every 30 minutes. and it does restart my server my every 30 mins
But, it doesnt close my runserver, it just opens my new server, so i wind up with my server not being shut down, it does open a new runserver, but because my first runserver was not closed, i get a Port 43594 already in use...
This is whats in my Voule Batch File [code]@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title name Voule Auto Restarter java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls[/code]
I also have that stupid silabsoft server console (if that meens anything)

item.title: A Problem with my Voule (AutoRestarter)

item.title: A Problem with my Voule (AutoRestarter)
item.dc:creator: @blakdaddy blakdaddy
item.description:
@blakdaddy wrote:

Well, i finally was convinced to download an auto restarter, and the Voule is the only one that has worked for me.
which is sad, because it doesnt work.

My Problem:
The Voule starts my server, and its simple to set to reboot every 30 minutes. and it does restart my server my every 30 mins

But, it doesnt close my runserver, it just opens my new server, so i wind up with my server not being shut down, it does open a new runserver, but because my first runserver was not closed, i get a Port 43594 already in use…

This is whats in my Voule Batch File

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title name Voule Auto Restarter java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls

I also have that stupid silabsoft server console (if that meens anything)

Read full topic
